title: Settlers' Oatmeal Stout
description: 2019 US Open Beer Championship Gold Medalist

title: Lemongrass and Ginger Wheat
description: This great summer beer is our American Wheat with a twist! We added fresh lemongrass and ginger throughout the brewing process resulting in very clean refreshing flavors without an overbearing ginger taste. The ABV is 5.5%.

title: Cream Ale
description: Our Cream Ale is a light, thirst quenching ale with an amazing balance of malt to hop ratio. It comes in at 5.2 ABV and is one that can be enjoyed all day!

title: Russian Imperial Stout
description: Our Russian Imperial Stout is a rich, intense brew with big complex flavors & an aggressive hop profile with a warming dry finish. It's complex malt profile includes many roasted and chocolate malts. It has a low carbonation level and the ABV is 10%.

title: Hazy Girl!
description: This New England style Hazy IPA has a huge hop nose but a low bitter profile.

title: Amberzon
description: An Imperial Amber Ale that comes in at 7.5%. The color is a dark amber with a nice thick head. The aroma is extremely balanced with a perfect hop character and a ton of malty complexity!

title: Anniversary Ale
description: An experimental strong ale

title: 2 Bros Brew Pale Ale
description: This pale ale is very light and smooth coming in at 5.25 ABV. We used Mosaic hops whole leaf and pellet. It's a great summer beer!

title: Down the Hatch
description: "Down The Hatch" a Lemongrass Ginger Wheat with Hatch Green Chile.

title: The 11th Hour
description: It’s rich malt base and medium hop profile. It has a smooth yet full body taste and it improves as it gets warmer.

title: Ryes Up!!
description: The Vallensons' Rye is brewed with 50% Rye and 50% base malt. This beer comes in at 5.5% ABV. It has a long lasting white head with a touch of haze. It's smells delicious with a low to moderate grainy, spicy rye character. The full body mouthfeel and dry finish is one that will definitely quench your thirst.

title: Proof is in the porter
description: It’s perfect for this fall weather. Roasted malts featuring chocolate and coffee flavors with a balanced hop profile for a smooth finish. This is the third release of our fall series. It has a roasted malty aroma with a hint of molasses.

title: Christmas Ale
description: Our Christmas Ale is brewed in the style of an English Old Ale with an emphasis of the Winter Warmer profile. Brewed with fresh spruce tips. ABV is 6.8%. Perfect for your holiday celebrations!

title: V3
description: This IPA is the 3rd in our experimental series. It has a fresh, full flavor with a tribute to the classic IPAs with a post modern twist and an amazing fruity hop profile, which gives an explosion of tropical fruit flavors and a sharp bitter finish. This one comes in at 7.3 ABV.

title: Pat’s Bourbon BBL-Aged Oatmeal Stout
description: We are saddened by the recent passing of one of our regulars, Pat, our “Norm”. We are blessed to have met Pat and will greatly miss seeing him every Friday and Saturday at the end of our bar enjoying his Vallensons’ favorite, The Settlers’ Oatmeal Stout. In his memory, we name our newest beer Pat’s Bourbon BBL-Aged Oatmeal Stout. This is our first barrel-aged release. Aged in bourbon barrels to create a rich, complex, medium-bodied beer with a Chocolate Roast flavor and aroma with warm bourbon and oak undertones and it gets better as is warms up. 7% ABV. This release is limited in quantity. RIP Pat.

title: Vallensons’ Coffee Stout
description: Vallensons’ Coffee Stout is the ultimate warmer; perfect for cold weather. Our Coffee Stout is a fusion of dark roasted malts with fresh coffee from our very own local Pearland Coffee Roasters ! This beer has several layers of dark chocolate and caramel-like flavors with an amazing coffee nose and subtle bitterness. 7.5% ABV.

title: Pear Ale
description: Test Small Batch (limited): PEAR ALE! Before we opened, we discussed making a Pear beer in honor our our hometown! Testing the waters...hoping it becomes a favorite and a Vallensons’ staple! We welcome feedback & always strive to improve new experimental brews! Come try it today!

title: Effin' Hazy IPA
description: Our NE IPA has an amazing nose, little to no bitterness, and makes the palate dance with it’s full and creamy yet soft mouthfeel. 6% ABV. With this beer, we salute our Texas flag. Come celebrate your independence with us! Cheers!

title: Vilzner
description: We finally made the highly requested light beer. The Vilzner is a crisp, clean 5.2% ABV Pilsner brewed with Pilsner Malt and East Kent Golding Hops. Just in time for the warmer months!

title: Taevas (BBA RIS)
description: Our Russian Imperial Stout is a rich, intense brew with big complex flavors & an aggressive hop profile with a warming dry finish. It's complex malt profile includes many roasted and chocolate malts. Now its aged of months in Garrison Brother Bourban Barrels. It has a low carbonation level and the ABV is 13.3%.

title: Dos Hijos Pale
description: Introducing our clean crisp MeIican Pale Ale. With the sons of Vallensons in mind, we name this one, Dos Hijos! This is a unique pale ale with moderate bitterness and a soft bready malt backbone.

title: The Haas
description: This West Coast style uses a blend of simcoe and centennial hops resulting in perfect clarity and a tropical fruit profile with a slight hint of pine. This great traditional IPA reminds Valle of the IPAs he once enjoyed while stationed with the USAF in California. 7.0% ABV Cheers!

title: West Coast IPA
description: This West Coast style uses a blend of simcoe and centennial hops resulting in perfect clarity and a tropical fruit profile with a slight hint of pine. This great traditional IPA reminds Valle of the IPAs he once enjoyed while stationed with the USAF in California. 7.0% ABV Cheers!

title: Bourbon Barrel Aged American Wheat with Lemon Grass and Ginger
Resilience IPA
description: This beer was brewed by over 1400 breweries across the country to help support those affected by the camp fires. 100% of Resilience IPA sales will go to the Sierra Nevada Camp Fire Relief fund to help Butte County rebuild its community.

title: The Drier Brut IPA
description: In honor of the “fallen” Rice Silos that were at the end of our street (Rice Drier), we name this one The Drier Brut IPA. This one is even better and dryer than our first Brut. It comes in at a big 8.1% ABV.

title: BeauTEAful Ale
description: This is the first of our spring and summer Herbal Tea Beer Series. This is a light pale ale with an earthy and floral hops profile with an element of citrus. We used fresh herbs at different stages of the mash and boil to come up with this BeauTeaful beer. Some of the herbs consist of dried apples, rose-hips, BlackBerry leaves, Hibiscus, and more. Perfect timing for the spring and summer months.

title: CrafTEA Peach
description: 2019 US Open Beer Championship bronze Medalist! This is the second of our spring and summer Herbal Tea Beer Series. A light pale ale with an earthy and floral hops profile and an element of citrus. We used fresh herbs, including peach, lemongrass, Hibiscus, and more, at different stages of the mash and boil. We think it’s even better than our BeauTEAful beer!

title: Pink
description: 2019 US Open Beer Championship bronze Medalist! “Pink” is an amazing fragrant tart cherry Berliner Weisse with an amazing cherry nose, dry palate, and a sour tart quenching acidity at the finish. The tart cherries lightens the tart finish & makes for a great Mother’s Day weekend rollout!

title: Pink (Nitro)
description: Our 2022 World Cup GOLD Medal Pink is on Nitro for a limited time! Enjoy it today! Cheers

title: English IPA
description: English IPA! It’s packed with flavor and offers a bold balance of hops which represent lavender, thyme, and bright piney aroma, with subtle tones of stone fruit, and firm bitterness. Those who like ESBs will love this one!

title: BBL ExBERRYmental Ale
description: 2019 US Open Beer Championship bronze Medalist!

title: Berliner Sunrise
description: Our 3rd Berliner Weisse will be on tap tomorrow at 3pm! The citrus note from the yeast and the Macintosh Apples gives this Berliner an amazing taste and smell. The tart and sweet balance will keep you coming back for more! It’s like breakfast in a glass! All you need is a side of bacon and eggs! Cheers!

title: Schwarzbier
description: It has a nice light roastiness on the nose, with a touch of cocoa and a little extra bitterness. The german noble hops combined with the roasted barley allows this one to finish amazingly light, crispy and sessionable!!! 5.5% ABV

title: Scottich Ale/80 Shillings
description: This Scottish-style brown ale has an attractive cherry color; a soft, light body and a hint of licorice in its malt character and a perfect hop balance. It’s rich and dark yet not strong. 5.6% ABV.

title: Apple Wassail Sour
description: Apple Wassail Sour, a spin on a family wassail recipe. And while this beer is COLD, it was brewed with hibiscus, ginger, lemon & cinnamon...a perfect balance of the mulled ingredients used in the wassail recipe that Valle and his family has enjoyed for years! Sour & sweet flavored with mulling spices. Smooth, delicious, drinkable! Get it fully dressed with cinnamon stick and lemon! And as Valle would say with a Wassail in hand.

title: Ordinary Bitter
description: Leap Beer 2020! It’s an Ordinary Bitter and it’s tasty!

title: Daisy Chain Hazy NEIPA
description: We are honored to be part of the 2020 Houston Daisy Chain project! 1 Yeast, 11 Breweries! We brewed a Hazy NEIPA, 6% ABV, that we triple dry hopped with simcoe, cascade, and ahtanum. Its amazing creamy body and perfectly balanced hop characteristic provides an aroma that is packed full of floral, earthy, pine, and grapefruit notes.

title: Becky Roo Da Monster
description: We are finally rolling out our very first Belgian! We named this special beer in honor of a close friend’s beloved dog who passed away. Becky Roo Da Monsta is a very high-gravity Belgian Ale coming in at 11.2% ABV. The mellow phenolic character is balanced by an ester profile of pear and light banana. Definitely a sipper but dangerously light in taste so be careful cause it will sneak up on ya!

title: Wee Heavy
description: Our Wee Heavy Scotch Ale has a rich and malty backbone with a nice balance of crystal malts. There are very little hops needed for this false to style Wee Heavy resulting in a very nice full bodied 7% ABV ale.

title: No Citrus hazy Pale Ale
description: No Citrus” Hazy Pale Ale is packed full of botanicals and has hints of passion fruit skin and blood orange with just a hint dank herbal qualities resulting in a balanced bitterness to malt profile. This leans towards the other end of the spectrum for Hazy Pales having no citrus notes, no citrus aroma, or no citrus flavor.

title: Black Currant Berliner Weisse
description: Our Black Currant Berliner Weisse is just in time for the spring and summer months. The sourness dominates the profile and the fruit leads to a moderately sweet fruity character.

title: Pineapple Sour
description: Our new Pineapple Sour has a subtle pineapple up front taste which adds sweetness but the finish is actually quite dry and delicious.

title: Tropical Pale Ale
description: Our Tropical Pale Ale has the perfect balance of malt and German hops and the finish reflects hints of passion fruit, dried Mango and Guava. Perfect beer for those hot days

title: FallTEA
description: The FallTEA is the next addition in our tea series. This semi malty ale falls inline with the “Fall” weather months, hence the name “FallTEA”. This beer is brewed with dried blood oranges, orange peels, dried cranberries, cinnamon, ginger, nutmeg, cloves and chai and black tea.

title: Settlers' Oatmeal Stout Oak Barrel Aged
Sour As 2020
description: It’s as “Sour As 2020!

title: EXP HAZY #1
description: Experimental NEIPA brewed with Australian hops...it’s really good!

title: Mango Sour
description: Our Mango sour has a rich blend of tropical notes and a dominant mango aroma & taste. The balance between the pineapple sweetness and the natural produced acid from the fermentation provides a pleasing balanced tartnesss, this is a tropical twist for a low gravity sour.

title: The Mora Sour
description: The Mora Sour named after its super tangy and sour Andean Blackberry. You want more sour, you get mora sour. The fruit’s nickname is “Mora” as it's called in Colombia and Ecuador. It is a tangy and sour type of blackberry and It’s like whipping together ripe raspberries, blackberries, cranberries and lingonberries, and kicking it up a notch — or a thousand. We added a lil vanilla as well.

title: Li'l Vik'n Rootbeer
description: Launching Li’L Vik’n sodas! Our youngest son, Konner, loves sodas and asked dad to start making them again so we put the kid on the payroll and he is working closely with dad to put out some tasty sodas. Konner is coming up with different flavors but in the meantime, he and dad are bringing the root beer back.

title: Vallensons ExtraVahAzzier IPA
description: The ExtraVahAzzier IPA is our newest NEIPA creation. It unleashes vibrant orange, grapefruit, passion fruit, and guava notes…and E.T. dust aka thiols which are highly aroma active compounds derived from hops. ABV is 5.5%. This is the first of the VBC mission series.

title: Honey Budz
description: The Honey Pot is a Belgian Golden Strong style brewed in collaboration with Budz Bee Farm. Instead of the belgian candi sugar traditionally used, we replaced it with the latest harvest of honey from their farm in Pearland. Added in a couple budz to help in the process and we ended up with a beautifully balanced belgian tripel. This is a great beer made by two locally, family-owned, small businesses!!

title: Happy HoliHaze
description: NEIPA with Spruce Tips, Orange and Cranberry

title: Happy HoliHaze (2022)
style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
description: NEIPA with Spruce Tips, Orange and Cranberry

title: BBA Imperial Amber
description: An 11.6% BBA Imperial Amber blended aging between Whitmeyer bourbon and Garrison Brothers bourbon barrels.

title: Texas Squeeze IPA
description: The Texas Squeeze IPA is a fruited IPA with fresh Rio Red grapefruit, lemongrass and whole leaf cascade hops. This one is bitter and balanced.

title: ExtraVahAzzier Mission 2
description: We are excited to bring to you…Mission 2 of our ExtraVahAzzier Series (EVA Mission 2). This Hazy IPA is brewed with Trident, Citra, and El Dorado hops. The Trident hops provides a hop forward punch to the nose and balanced bitterness. It exhibits hints of fruity, citrus, tropical, passion fruit. The El Dorado adds pineapple and Mango and the Citra adds the citrus character which makes for an intense fruit flavor. This one is literally out of this world!

title: Key Lime Pie Sour
description: Our Key Lime Pie Sour was brewed with 50 pounds of crushed graham cracker crumbs, Madagascar vanilla beans, and fresh key limes. This one reminds us of the Florida Keys which we all miss very much

title: DewDew Brown
description: This Brown Ale (left) is a malt bomb for those who love Malty beers. It was brewed with flaked and malted oats which gives it an amazing mouthfeel. The combination of the malts used, mash temp, and hops makes this an amazing one for our portfolio. 7% ABV.

title: 5th Anniversary IPA
description: Double dry hopped IPA is our 5th Anniversary IPA. The malts and hops (Centennial, Cascade and Simcoe) selected produced a well balanced IPA for our anniversary. 6.5% ABV.

title: Long Time No Tea
description: Double dry hopped IPA is our 5th Anniversary IPA. The malts and hops (Centennial, Cascade and Simcoe) selected produced a well balanced IPA for our anniversary. 6.5% ABV.

title: Father Day IPA
description: A NEW IPA brewed with Idaho 7 and cascade hops. This is a really balanced IPA and the aroma is amazing! The Pine and Citrus notes really pop on this one. 5% ABV.

title: BBA Imperial Amber 2022
description: Bourbon Barrel Aged Imperial Amber aged in Garrison Brothers bourbon barrels for 6 months. The balance from the malts and aging in the barrels provides an amazing combination of oak, bourbon, caramel and vanilla. It gets better the longer it warms up and will go perfect with a cigar.

title: Belgian Witbier
description: Our first Belgium Witbier is a refreshing crisp dry beer that showcases a perfect balance between malt and hops and Belgian yeast. The zesty, orange-fruitiness notes blended with light hints of coriander and a few other spices makes this an awesome for the summer months.

title: Wrong Pitch
description: Wrong Pitch is a Belgian table beer coming it at 4%. This beer is a unique mixture of 2 different yeast strands, one that was accidentally pitched by the boss himself! Hence, the name “Wrong Pitch”. Some mistakes turn into good things! The outcome of this mistake is a super crushable session Belgian-style table beer, which is perfect for the hot summer months.

title: It's Melon Season
description: Can't Have Sumer without watermelon. The balance of sour, salty, and sweet watermelon is one that will quench your thirst

title: Starburst
description: Starburst is a seltzer with hibiscus, raspberry

title: Vallensons Tropical Starburst
description: Starburst is a seltzer with hibiscus, raspberry

title: Cosmic Throat Punch
style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
description: his was a fun collaboration with our good friends from Chandlers Ford Brewing out of Huntsville, Alabama. This double Hazy IPA is an amazing blend of multiple grains including Golden Promise, Maris Otter, and Oats. We also used a blend of New Zealand hops which we used in the mash, boil, and dry hopping and a Thiolized yeast which resulted in a double Hazy IPA that expresses huge amount vibrant grapefruit, passion fruit, guava hence the name Cosmic Throat Punch! 7.5% ABV. Enjoy it while it lasts! Great collaboration on the artwork by our artist, Casey, and their’s, Adam

title: PCR Coffee Stout On Nitro
description: PCR Coffee Stout on Nitro. This is our latest collaboration brew with Pearland Coffee Roasters. The balance between the malts, hops and coffee makes this an amazing stout for all coffee lovers. The nitro results in a creaminess that you are going to love! Try it today! 5% ABV

title: Donna Wanna
description: DonnaWanna IPA will be flowing through our taps today! This great beer is named after Lori’s sister, Donna! The artwork was created around her love for horses and barrel racing. Join us tonight as we celebrate her birthday and the release of her beer!

title: VallensonsPina
description: Piña is a piña colada Blonde Ale conditioned on pineapples & coconut.  We are putting Piña on Nitro to accentuate the creaminess of this beer. 6% ABV

title: Dashboard Dancer
description: Dashboard Dancer is an imperial sour conditioned on bananas, strawberries, and coconut. 6.5% ABV

title: EVA: Mission 3
description: EVA Mission 3 is the 3rd Hazy IPA in our ExtraVahAzzier Mission Series. This great beer has coconut, peach, and pineapple on the aroma with a strong tangerine, grapefruit finish. This is a big one at 8% ABV!

title: Belgian Golden Strong
description: This Belgian Golden Strong is a big one at 11.5% ABV! LIMIT 2

title: EXP HAZY #1
style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

title: Happy HoliHaze (2022)
style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

title: Bourbon Barrel Aged Lemongrass Ginger Wheat
Honey Potz (Golden Honey Stout) (Nitro)
description: This is the second beer made with honey from the Local Budz Bee Farm. We also used Hazelnuts, coffee and vanilla. To top this off we put this on nitro which results in a creamy deliciousness.

title: VERIant
style: Sour - Fruit with Elderberry and Pomegrant
description: You may remember the Veri, our popular Raspberry sour that is no longer being produced due to the significant cost increase in fresh raspberries. As an alternative, we decided to change a few things resulting in a variant of the Veri. We call this one, The VERIant. A fruited sour with a very precise blend of Elderberry and Pomegranate. The balance of the PH and sweetness resulted in a sour beer that is going to make your taste buds very happy.
